name: Magelander
desc: Has the stats to equip metal wand (20 LUK) and invested remaining AP into INT.

name: Pure STRlander
desc: Has invested all AP into STR.

name: Pure DEXlander
desc: Has invested all AP into DEX.

name: NoPointer
desc: Has not invested any AP or SP.

name: Max Dodge
desc: Has at least 152 avoid.

name: Knife Strats
desc: Can hit minimum 80 damage with Fruit Knife equipped, unbuffed.

name: Omok Collector
desc: Owns all three Omok table variants.

desc: Owns a +2 scrolled top.

name: Gomu +3
desc: Owns a +3 scrolled gomushin.

name: Gomu +4
desc: Owns a +4 scrolled gomushin.

name: 50 Stat Witch Hat
desc: Owns a talking witch hat with +50 or more total stats.

desc: Owns a talking witch hat with +40 or more total stats.

desc: Owns a talking witch hat with +30 or more total stats.

name: Chair Collector (12)
desc: Owns at least 12 different chairs.

desc: Owns at least 24 different chairs.

desc: Owns at least 36 different chairs.

name: Chair Collector (48)
desc: Owns at least 48 different chairs.

name: Meso Hoarder (500m)
desc: Holds at least 500,000,000 mesos.

desc: Holds at least 250,000,000 mesos.

name: Meso Hoarder (1B)
desc: Holds at least 1,000,000,000 mesos.

name: Meso Hoarder (750m)
desc: Holds at least 750,000,000 mesos.

name: Meso Hoarder (2B)
desc: Holds at least 2,000,000,000 mesos.

name: Umbrella Collector
desc: Owns one of each umbrella (Purple, Sky Blue, Green, Yellow, Beige, Red, Black, Maple).

name: Tube Collector
desc: Owns one of each tube (Blue Flowery, Red Flowery, Purple, Emergency Rescue, Black, Colorful, Duck (50), Duck (100).

name: Glove Collector
desc: Owns one of each work glove color (White, Grey, Yellow, Blue, Red, Purple).

name: Rose Collector
desc: Owns a blue-tagged rose of each color (Yellow, Red, White, Blue).

name: Perfect Lights
desc: Owns a perfect Maplemas Lights (53 attack, 16 speed).

name: Perfect Surfboard
desc: Owns a perfect Gold Surfboard (48 attack, 11 jump).

name: Perfect Maple Umbrella
desc: Owns a perfect Maple Umbrella (55 attack, 19 speed).

name: Perfect Metal Wand
desc: Owns a perfect Metal Wand (29 WA, 42 MA).

name: Dynamic Hair
desc: Owns the Dynamic Hair medal.

name: Stolen Fence
desc: Owns a Stolen Fence.

name: Artifact Hunter
desc: Owns the Artifact Hunter medal or Archaeologist hat/glasses.

name: Lemon Collector
desc: Owns at least 300 lemons.

name: Anniversary Jumper (180s)
desc: Completed Pink Bean's Birthday Challenge in 180s or less.

desc: Completed Pink Bean's Birthday Challenge in 150s or less.

desc: Completed Pink Bean's Birthday Challenge in 120s or less.

desc: Completed the Halloween Challenge in 270s or less.

desc: Completed the Halloween Challenge in 300s or less.

name: Big Hit (200)
desc: Has hit for over 200 damage (Only buff allowed is NX weather buffs).

desc: Has hit for over 300 damage (Only buff allowed is NX weather buffs).

name: Big Hit (500)
desc: Has hit for over 500 damage (Only buff allowed is NX weather buffs).

desc: Has hit for over 800 damage (Only buff allowed is NX weather buffs).

name: Big Hit (1000)
desc: Has hit for over 1000 damage (Only buff allowed is NX weather buffs).

name: Perfect Starters
desc: Owns a perfect Sword (24wa), Hand Axe (24wa), and Club (26wa).

name: 14-Stat Pet
desc: Owns a pet equip with a total +14 to speed/jump.

name: 15-Stat Pet
desc: Owns a pet equip with a total +15 to speed/jump.

name: Ashes
desc: Failed 30 consecutive scrolls in one sitting.

name: 20 Speed Broom
desc: Owns a 20+ speed broomstick.

desc: Owns a 25+ speed broomstick.

name: Blue Maplemas
desc: Owns blue-tagged versions of each Christmas weapon (Maplemas lights, Christmas Tree, Maplemas Tree, Versalmas Cactus).
